response:
Right relative afferent pupillary defect indicates an optic nerve lesion. Unilateral right-leg spasticity with hyperreflexia, clonus, Babinski, impaired proprioception/vibration, positive Romberg, and gait unsteadiness localise to a right hemicord/posterior-lateral thoracic cord process sparing the arms. Two lesions best explain the picture.

lesion_locations = ["right optic nerve", "right thoracic spinal cord"]
